data.message:
This is all political, fake ass rappers cnt even spot a good deed that's reciprocical. Well let me be reciprocical to thee/Loving Eminem doesnt make us fanatics his dick riders, we are SHADIES. Fuck all u mutha fuckers who curse the greatest rapper on this universe, Eminem is the greatest, i can even say that in reverse. Tsetaerg eht si menimE, fuck all u aliens/ Im a psycho, when i listen to him i feel the need to curse, not to be rude tho, all i wanna do is to drop a verse. Im done with ya fake asses i need to bail, keep spitting shit abt him ill make ur dicks my ponytale. This short verse aint a fairytale, it fucks with all ur dreams call it a DickTale.

#MuthaFuckers-Dispense from my Nightingale!👊

replies.message: Your rap not good. Get a life .
